snippet: Sunshine Laundromat in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, has an arcade with 23 pinball machines, a coin-operated fortunetelling chimp and a new wine and beer bar.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Sunshine Laundromat, Greenpoint, Brooklyn wash-and-dry offering snacks and more than 20 vintage pinball machines among its amenities.
lead_paragraph: Sunshine Laundromat in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, has an arcade with 23 pinball machines, a coin-operated fortunetelling chimp and a new wine and beer bar.

headline.print_headline: Soak. Wash. Rinse. Dry. No Tilt!
